general.title: Vampire Party
error: Something went wrong.  Please check your internet connection or try again later.

waitingRoom.name: Name
waitingRoom.welcomeText: Velcome {playerName}, you're now in the *spooky* waiting room #{gameSessionId}. Chill out and relax while everyone else joins.... if you can... mwahahaha
waitingRoom.vipWelcomeText: {playerName}, as the first play to join room #{gameSessionId} you have special responsibilities.  Once more than four players have joined you can start the game.

description.Vampire: Each night, the Vampires can select one non-vampire to attack if there are multiple vampires,  but they must all be in agreement to kill
description.Cullen: A vegetarian vampire who dislikes other vampires and wins if humans win. If the Garlic Farmer chooses to gift The Cullen garlic there is a chance they will die or become a vampire.  If a vampire attacks the Cullen, they will fend them off.
description.Garlic Farmer: The Garlic Farmer knows well the lore of the Vampire, and is devoted to protecting the town with his crop.  They have enough garlic to give one garlic to every player - including themselves.  By giving a garlic to a human they are guaranteeing their protection from the vampires for the night.
description.Priest: The morning after a player is killed by a vampire, the priest may resurrect that player.  This can only be done once per game.
description.Human Person: Humans have no special skills or abilities.
description.Librarian: Librarian has many books rich with town history, including records of paranormal and supernatural events. Every night the librarian may research a player and learn with some degree of accuracy whether that player is a vampire or not.  This is an art not a science and the librarian is not always correct.
description.Mayor: The Mayor of this town may once a game rig the election and exclusively decide who will be executed during the day voting phase.

default.Cullen: The vampires are out... but so is the garlic farmer, and the librarian.
default.Priest: The vampires are out... but so is the garlic farmer, and the librarian.
default.Human Person: The vampires are on the hunt... but so is the garlic farmer, and the librarian.
default.Mayor: The vampires are out... but so is the garlic farmer, and the librarian.

vampireVote.voted: The hunt is on.  You plan to feast on {name}.
vampireVote.agreeOnVote: All vampires must be in agreement in order to begin the hunt
vampireVote.resting: Last night you attacked a vampire in human clothes.  You were injured in the fray and must rest.

garlicVote.instructions: As the garlic farmer you get choose who to give garlic to. But remember you can only give each player one garlic per game.

instructions: You can research a player... although not always accurate you can try and ascertain if they are human or vampire
Pick quick! Once the night is over you've missed your chance to research.

roleResearchResults.Vampire: You are fairly certain {name} is a vampire
roleResearchResults.Human Person: Based on your research {name} is human

priestVote.instructions: {name} was killed... would you like to resurrect them?

playerResurrected.Garlic Farmer: You have been resurrected by the priest!
playerResurrected.Priest: You have been resurrected by the priest! Bless your brethren!  Yes... there can be more than one of you.
playerResurrected.Human Person: You've been given a second chance at life!  The priest has resurrected you!
playerResurrected.Librarian: You have been resurrected by the priest!
playerResurrected.Mayor: You have been resurrected by the priest!

alreadyUsedSuperPower.death: You've already used your resurrection powers this game.
alreadyUsedSuperPower.nobodyDied: You've already used your resurrection powers... luckily nobody died.

mayorVote.instructions: You may choice to override the results - making your vote supersede none-politicians
mayorVote.alreadyUsedSuperPower: You've already used your mayoral super vote this game.

notHunted.self: You slept well... with the knowledge that you protected yourself.
notHunted.Garlic Farmer: You find some garlic on your front steps... and you didn't put it there! Farmers stick together
notHunted.Priest: You find some garlic on your front steps...
notHunted.Human Person: You find some garlic on your front steps...
notHunted.Librarian: You find some garlic on your front steps...
notHunted.Mayor: You find some garlic on your front steps... some offering!
notHunted.Vampire: You were given garlic...which makes you ill... No hunting for you!

hunted.self: You are pleased you put garlic out front, as there are scratch marks on your front door
hunted.Garlic Farmer: You find scratch marks are your front steps...
hunted.Priest: You find scratch marks are your front steps...
hunted.Human Person: You find scratch marks are your front steps...
hunted.Librarian: You find scratch marks are your front steps...
hunted.Mayor: You find scratch marks are your front steps...

garlicUpdates.fuckedOver: You went to pay a visit to {name}, and there was garlic there... so you went home.  Foul stuff!
garlicUpdates.gaveToFellowVamp: A member of your vampire crew was given garlic.  No hunting tonight....

cullenUpdates.expired: You were given garlic... too many years on a none-human diet has made you week... you are a goner
cullenUpdates.turned: You received garlic... it enrages you to such an extent that you revert to your true form... You are now a vampire, and will win or lose with your nest

vampireNotice.expired: You went to attack... and all you found was a pile of ashes...
vampireNotice.turned: Great news! Your veggie sibling has rejoined the nest.  {name} is now a vampire!

vampireAttackedCullen.Cullen: You were attacked by the Vamps - they thought you were human... you fought them off
vampireAttackedCullen.Vampire: That was no human you attacked! {name} took you by surprise... and injured more than your pride... you must rest the following evening

default.Vampire: Time to vote on who dies next... keep a low profile - they're looking for you!
default.Cullen: Vote on who must be staked next!
default.Priest: Vote on who must be staked next!
default.Garlic Farmer: Vote on who must be staked next!
default.Human Person: Vote on who must be staked next!
default.Librarian: Vote on who must be staked next!
default.Mayor: Vote on who must be staked next!

content.mayoralSuperVote: Today your votes are all that count!

content.Vampire: Look at the main screen to see vote results.
content.Cullen: Look at the main screen to see vote results.
content.Garlic Farmer: Look at the main screen to see vote results.
content.Priest: Look at the main screen to see vote results.
content.Human Person: Look at the main screen to see vote results.
content.Librarian: Look at the main screen to see vote results.
content.Mayor: Look at the main screen to see vote results.

content.Vampire: You are no longer undead... in fact you are a pile of ashes...
content.Cullen: You are gone... you never wanted to hurt anyone... why... why!
content.Garlic Farmer: You are dead... who will water the garden?

expired: Beyond the grave you revel in your demonic friends triumph
notExpired: Long live the vampires! Do your vampire dance
You can't truly be shocked.  Humans are just stray cattle in the end...

expired: You only wanted to help those humans... how did it come to this?
notExpired: How did it come to this... You just wanted a simple human life...

expired: My farm... no!
notExpired: Now I suppose you will be farmed by the vampires...

expired: You are dead.
notExpired: You will not pray for the soulless admonitions that have defeated you.

expired: You have been defeated...
notExpired: You have lost, and it's doubtful you will win the next election

expired: Not so booksmart after all... can't read in the grave.
notExpired: All your studies couldn't have prepared you for this defeat.

expired: You are dead and defeated.
notExpired: Well, might as well offer yourself up to the vamps.
With your last dying breath you pledge revenge against these satanic spawns...

expired: You are dead...again. See you in hell.
I hope you enjoy eternal damnnation, because yer dead.
Hey, at least you died trying to help those you love... even if they may not have loved you back.
notExpired: You won! But I don't recommend revealing your true nature to your friends. You saw what they do to Vampires.

expired: You may be dead, but your sacrifices (and bad breath) will never be forgotten
notExpired: You've beaten the odds against these oversized mosquito!

expired: You're dead, but hey your friends won
notExpired: You've beaten the odds against these oversized mosquito!

expired: You're dead, but hey your friends won
notExpired: You've beaten the odds against these oversized mosquito!

expired: You're dead, but hey your friends won
notExpired: You've beaten the odds against these oversized mosquito!

expired: You're dead, but hey your friends won

general.title: Vampire Party
error: Something went wrong.  Please check your internet connection or try again later.

waitingRoom.title: Party Lobby
waitingRoom.waitingForPlayers: You need {playersNeeded} more player{pluralize} to start the game
waitingRoom.readyToStart: {vipPlayer} can start the game when everyone has joined

exitModal.waitingRoomPlayersInGame: Leaving now will end the game for everyone.  I know {randomPlayer} is gonna be super sad

text: Salutations and welcome to Vampire Party
So glad you could make it. You won't live...to regret it

content.text: This game is a survival game in which the minority of the players are vampires pitted against the majority, humans.
Humans win if all vampires are exterminated.
Vampires win if there are more vampires than humans.
On your phone you should what character you have randomly been assigned.  If you don't see it, try refreshing the page
Don't share this info with other players.  Your character is a secret you should take to the grave.
Whenever your phone says "Read instructions on main screen." - LOOK HERE!
Every aspect of the game involves voting or make choices about other players.
As such, it's HIGHLY recommended using your actual names.  If you don't, it'll be confusing, harder to learn, and subsequently less fun.
If you are unsure who {playerNames} are, you should probably quit and restart the game.
To pause/exit the game press the [ESC] key.
If you are playing over video chat, it is suggested the host shares their video and audio with everyone.
There are three phases in the game, and depending on who your character is you'll be able to perform actions at those times.
The phases are,  Night, Morning and Day - but we'll learn more about each of these phases as they approach!
It's a fast paced game so if you don't get it the first time, try playing again. The more you play, the greater variety of characters you'll get to try out!

text: It is night time.  Look at your phone for further instructions.

night.title: Night
night.content: Hey guys, it's bedtime. AKA time to check your phone obsessively until you fall asleep... or die! No seriously, don't take your eyes off your phone until morning.

text: It is morning time.  Look at your phone for further instructions.

morning.title: Morning
morning.content: How did everyone sleep? Let's see...
nothingHappened: Aww, everyone woke up before me? Well, at least that means you're all here and no one died
It was a quiet night. The only disturbance I heard was {randomPlayer}'s insaaaaane sleep fart. I don't know whether to congratulate you or be concerned about your colon.
You guys, I had a crazy dream last night that {randomPlayer} had their blood drained by a Vampire. Good thing it was just a dream.
vampireKilled: Yikes, I just found {murderedPlayer}'s bloodless body
Nothing like the smell of {murderedPlayer}'s dead body in the morning!

expired: How Strange... checking on {name}, you find a pile of ashes... There can only be one explanation, right?
turned: The room just got a lot colder... do we have *another* vampire at this party now?

playerResurrected: Wonders of wonders, miracles of miracles! {name} has joined us back from the dead! Who do we have to thank?

text: Now is the time we play the Staking Game! Simply vote on who you think the vampire is. But lets take a few minutes and talk about it first, we only get three chances to come to an agreement, so lets make them count, people.

day.title: Day
day.content: Time for the Staking Game! Just take a stab at who you think the vampire is. It's easy as vamPIE...r.

Vampire: Where there once stood {victimName}, there is now a pile of ashes. One vampire down!
Cullen: Okay, this is hard to explain... but a pile of ashes was found where {victimName} was standing? I thought they were one of the good guys?
Garlic Farmer: {victimName} the {victimRole} is dead.  Goes to show bad breadth can kill you...
Priest: {victimName} the {victimRole} is now with the Lord. Put in a good word for me, buddy!
Mayor: {victimName} the {victimRole} is dead.  Damnit! You were relying on their endorsement!
Librarian: {victimName} the {victimRole} is dead.  Read em' and weep, boys. Read em' and weep.
Human Person: {victimName} the {victimRole} is dead.  That is too bad.

pollResults.onlyTwoPlayersLeft: This is the final showdown... It doesn't look promising for the the last person standing
pollResults.noTriesLeft: No one is dying today.  It's almost as if someone  or something... is trying to thwart your attempts, and create disagreement within your group
pollResults.oneTryLeft: Seriously? Can't we all just get along? One last try...
pollResults.twoTriesLeft: If you can't... agree nobody dies.. you have two tries left

Vampire: Well, this mayor just locked in your vote for next term... He *literally* just slayed a Vampire for y'all.
Cullen: Well, this mayor just locked in your vote for next term... He *literally* just slayed a Vampire for y'all.
Garlic Farmer: OMG... thanks to the Mayor being soo sure of themselves, {victimName} was just killed. Can't imagine he'll be Mayor much longer.
Priest: OMG... thanks to the Mayor being soo sure of themselves, {victimName} was just killed. Can't imagine he'll be Mayor much longer.
Mayor: OMG... thanks to the Mayor being soo sure of themselves, {victimName} was just killed. Can't imagine he'll be Mayor much longer.
Librarian: OMG... thanks to the Mayor being soo sure of themselves, {victimName} was just killed. Can't imagine he'll be Mayor much longer.
Human Person: OMG... thanks to the Mayor being soo sure of themselves, {victimName} was just killed. Can't imagine he'll be Mayor much longer.

vampireWin.title: Vampire Win
content: *Gulp* This only turned out well for our pointy toothed friends. I'm so sorry for inviting you all here. I hope you can accept my apology from beyond the grave.

expired: {name} the {role} hath een slain.
notExpired: {name} the {role} is truly a vamp champ. Congrats.
{name} the {role} is not dead, but undead (and proud of it!)

expired: {name} the {role}, our sparkly angel, is dead.
notExpired: {name} the {role} is still our sparkly friend!

expired: {name} the {role} is dead... let the legacy of the great allium cultivator live on.
notExpired: {name} the {role} is alive and farming

expired: {name} the priest has found their way to heavens gate. Hope God is cool with their new piercings.
notExpired: Blessed be, {name} can continue their 'pious' life

expired: {name} the mayor of this town is dead
notExpired: {name} the {role} will be once again, asking for your vote

expired: {name} the {role} has checked out... for good
notExpired: {name} the {role} is still in circulation

expired: {name} the boring {role} is dead
notExpired: {name} the {role} is still alive and powerless.

humanWin.title: Human Win
content: If you're a human (or a human ally) huzzah! You staked all those sneaky vampires! Well done. Now we can get back to the party.

expired: {name} the {role} is simply a pile of ashes R.I.P....again.
notExpired: {name} the {role} is truly a vamp champ
{name} the {role} is not dead, but undead (and proud of it!)
